
#SETDSTFILE("out/romfiles/data/script/stage03.bin")


#SETSIZE(224, 3)

#STARTMSG(0x10AF, 48)

//=======================================
// auto-generated string 0
//=======================================

// ふわぁあぁ〜〜……。[br]
// だいぶ遅くなっちゃったな[wait]
*Yaaawwwn...*[br]
We got here late.
[wait]


#ENDMSG()

#STARTMSG(0x10E7, 38)

//=======================================
// auto-generated string 1
//=======================================

// やっと、教団本部へ戻ってこれ[br]
// た……[wait]
We're finally back at the Order's Headquarters...
[wait]


#ENDMSG()

#STARTMSG(0x1115, 27)

//=======================================
// auto-generated string 2
//=======================================

// 疲れた。もう真夜中だなぁ[wait]
I'm exhausted. It's already gone midnight.
[wait]


#ENDMSG()

#STARTMSG(0x115D, 44)

// auto-generated string 3
//=======================================

// 回収したイノセンスは[br]
// どうしたらいいのかな[wait]
I wonder what I'm supposed to do with the Innocence we retrieved?
[wait]


#ENDMSG()

#STARTMSG(0x1198, 50)

//=======================================
// auto-generated string 4
//=======================================

// 科学班の方なら誰か[br]
// 起きてらっしゃると思いますよ[wait]
I'm sure someone in the Science Department is awake.
[wait]


#ENDMSG()

#STARTMSG(0x11D9, 21)

//=======================================
// auto-generated string 5
//=======================================

// じゃあ行ってみます[wait]
I'll head there then.
[wait]


#ENDMSG()

#STARTMSG(0x11F6, 75)

// auto-generated string 6

// ウォーカー殿、お疲れでしょう[br]
// ゆっくり休んでください[wait]
Well, it's time for me to return.[br]
Sir Walker, please have a good rest.
[wait]


#ENDMSG()

I will, thank you.

// missed string!
// this was skipped by the autodumper
// due to using a nonstandard SJIS
// character (the Roman numeral "II")
//=======================================

#STARTMSG(0x1B6C, 61)

// ジャーーン！[br]
// 我が科学班の救世主こと[br]
// 「コムリン[II]」でーす！[wait]

[wait]

// 頭のメイン回路を破壊すれば、[br]
// 自己修復ができなくなります[wait]
Komlin's weakness is his head. If we destroy the main circuit there, he won't be able to repair himself.
[wait]


#ENDMSG()

#STARTMSG(0xBF58, 81)

//=======================================
// auto-generated string 645
//=======================================

// そして急な明るさの変化にも[br]
// 弱く、突然周りが暗くなると[br]
// 一瞬動きが止まるそうです[wait]
He's also vulnerable to sudden changes in brightness, and will come to an abrupt halt in a sudden blackout.
[wait]


#ENDMSG()

#STARTMSG(0xBFB8, 77)

//=======================================
// auto-generated string 646
//=======================================

// ということは、暗いところに[br]
// おびき出してから頭部を破壊[br]
// してしまえばいいのね[wait]
Meaning our best hope would be to lure him to a dark place and destroy his head.
[wait]


#ENDMSG()

#STARTMSG(0xC014, 60)

//=======================================
// auto-generated string 647
//=======================================

// そうです。この教団内で暗くて[br]
// 戦いやすいところといえば……[wait]
That's right. Speaking of which, is there anywhere in headquarters where it's dark and easy to fight...?
[wait]


#ENDMSG()

#STARTMSG(0xC05F, 79)

//=======================================
// auto-generated string 648
//=======================================

// 吹抜けがいいんじゃないかし[br]
// ら？あそこなら天井が高いから[br]
// 頭上から攻撃も可能よ[wait]
I wonder if the elevator shaft would be good? The ceiling is tall there, so we might be able to launch an overhead attack.
[wait]


#ENDMSG()

#STARTMSG(0xC0BD, 61)

[wait]


#ENDMSG()

#STARTMSG(0x10F80, 17)

//=======================================
// auto-generated string 927
//=======================================

// ここは研究室だ[wait]
This is the laboratory.
[wait]


#ENDMSG()
